name: Island Adventure: Match-3 Game
description:
Muana got in trouble – she fell asleep while relaxing out in the sea and when she woke up she found herself washed to the shore of an uninhabited island. Muana is trying to survive and find the way back home, but first of all she must investigate the island. A colorful puzzle adventure that will take you across multiple locations and will get you acquainted with unique island sights along the way. Explore and uncover all the island’s secrets!
There’s always something new to expect. Gradually introduced game mechanics will keep your experience fresh and exciting.
You’ve got a long way ahead, but you’re not alone. A whole cast of quirky characters will assist you on your journey to the top of the mountain.
Every new level is unique and more challenging than the previous one. Make use of special tools to blast through even the toughest trials.

The game features:
• 40 unique levels
• Gorgeous graphics and special effects
• Impactful power-ups and bonuses
• Different areas and biomes: beach, volcano, jungle and many more
• Involving gameplay: make epic combos to unleash your full power
• Leaderboards & events
